none: Albert F. Wood, Detroit, Mich. Text: "A Free Packet of Satin Skin Complexion Powder; Adhesive, Invisible, harmless; Adds charming fairness, a gossamer glow of refinement. To beautify, tone down, remove shiny, oily appearance, secure a smooth satin skin, use Satin Skin Complexion Powder (4 tints) 25c. boxes. Natural flesh, Brilliant white, Rich pink, Perfect brunette." Text on reverse: "A dainty, feathery, beautifying application like Satin Skin Powder keeps the skin young, fresh and fair long after it would become coarse and uninviting, if neglected. Use Satin Skin Powder with the assurance that it is positively innocent and harmless in action. Only soothing, revivifying and a skin preservative of unusual merit and true worth."
